message.name: ERR_FV_CLIENT_MUST_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: At least one client must be selected to create an application case.

message.name: ERR_FV_APPLICATION_CASE_ADMIN_MANDATORY
message.locale: An application case configuration must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_SUBMITTED_DATE_TIME_MANDATORY
message.locale: Submitted date and time must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_MANDATORY
message.locale: Application reference must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_METHOD_OF_APPLICATION_MANDATORY
message.locale: Method of Application must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The Application Reference entered is too long (%1n), maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CLIENT_ALREADY_ADDED
message.locale: The client (%1s) has already been added to the application case.

message.name: ERR_XRV_SELECTED_MATCH_ALREADY_ON_APPLICATION
message.locale: The selected match is already a client on the application case.

message.name: ERR_XRV_SELECTED_MATCH_ALREADY_ON_ANOTHER_APPLICATION_CASE
message.locale: The selected match and %1s are both clients on %2s %3s.

message.name: ERR_XRV_ONLY_CLIENT_CANNOT_BE_REMOVED
message.locale: This client cannot be removed as the application case must have at least one active client.

message.name: ERR_XRV_APPLICATION_CASE_ADMIN_CANCELLED
message.locale: An application case cannot be created for the application case configuration, %1s, as it is cancelled.

message.name: ERR_FV_APPLICATION_DATE_MANDATORY
message.locale: Application date must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_PERSON_MUST_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: A person must be selected.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CLIENT_CANNOT_BE_ADDED_ONE_OR_MORE_PROGRAMS_AUTHORISED
message.locale: A client must not be added to the application when one or more programs have been authorized.
A client must not be added to the application when one or more programs have been authorised.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CLIENT_CANNOT_BE_REMOVED_IF_ONE_OR_MORE_PROGRAMS_AUTHORISED
message.locale: The client must not be removed from the application when one or more programs have been authorized.
The client must not be removed from the application when one or more programs have been authorised.

message.name: INF_DECEASED_TEXT
message.locale: Deceased

message.name: INF_CLIENT_NAME_AND_AGE_YEARS
message.locale: %1s (%2n years)

message.name: ERR_FV_DATE_MUST_NOT_BE_BEFORE_APPLICATION_DATE
message.locale: Date must be on or after the Application Date %1d.

message.name: ERR_FV_DATE_MUST_NOT_BE_IN_THE_FUTURE
message.locale: Date must be on or before today's date.

message.name: INF_DATE_BY
message.locale: %1d by

message.name: ERR_XRV_APPLICATION_FOR_PROGRAM_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: A pending application for %1s already exists for this client.

message.name: ERR_XRV_APPLICATION_FOR_PROGRAMS_ALREADY_EXIST
message.locale: Pending applications for %1s already exist for this client.

message.name: ERR_XRV_APPLICATION_FOR_PROGRAM_FOR_CLIENT_ON_APPLICATION_CASE
message.locale: A pending application for %1s already exists for %2s on %3s %4s.

message.name: ERR_XRV_APPLICATION_DATE_LATER_THAN_PROGRAM_ADDED_DATE
message.locale: The Application Date is later than the Added Date for one or more of the associated programs on the application case.

message.name: ERR_FV_DUE_TO_COMPLETE_MUST_BE_POSITIVE_INTEGER
message.locale: Due to Complete in Next (Days) must be a positive integer value.

message.name: ERR_FV_DUE_TO_COMPLETE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Due to Complete in Next (Days) must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_PROGRAMS_DUE_NO_RESULTS
message.locale: No programs due to complete could be found which matched the search criteria.

message.name: ERR_FV_DATE_MUST_NOT_BE_BEFORE_REFERRAL_DATE
message.locale: Date must be on or after the Referral Date %1d.

message.name: ERR_FV_REFERRAL_SOURCE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Source must be entered if other referral details are entered.

message.name: ERR_XRV_REFERRAL_DATE_LATER_THAN_PROGRAM_ADDED_DATE
message.locale: The Referral Date is later than the Added Date for one or more of the associated programs on the application case.
